--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Wolfenstein::
> 
> "Well i have two reasons for being here. One, I want to fight. Two, 
I'm looking for my brother. He was with this group. His anme was 
DrillBit. My skills are in pure combat. Say, you wouldn't know the 
whereabouts of DrillBit would you?"
